headline: Digital Realty (DLR) Profit Margin Surges on $1B One-Off Gain, Raising Earnings Quality Concerns
summary: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) posted a current net profit margin of 23.5%, sharply up from last year’s 7.5%, with revenue set to grow at 10.8% annually, outpacing the US market’s 10% average. Standout earnings growth reached 239.3% year-over-year, well beyond its 5-year average, though a one-off $1.0 billion gain significantly boosted reported profit. While the company is trading below estimated fair value on a discounted cash flow basis and benefits from a track record of profit and revenue...
